text: Ibrahim "Ibro" Biogradlić (8 March 1931 - 20 February 2015) was a Bosnian- Herzegovinian footballer. He was born in Sarajevo, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. He played at 1956 Summer Olympics for SFR Yugoslavia, winning a silver medal. He played for FK Sarajevo 646 times, making him the club's record holder for the most appearances. He died on 20 February 2015 in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina after a long illness, aged 83. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Deaths from disease Category:Olympic silver medalists Category:People from Sarajevo
title: Ibrahim Biogradlić
